snippet: The chief, Muhammad Deif, lost one of his wives and a baby son in Tuesday’s bombing of a house in Gaza City.
abstract: Fate of Hamas military wing's commander in chief Muhammad Deif remains mystery after Israeli warplanes drop at least five bombs on house in Gaza City, killing one of his wives and a baby son; airstrike is at least fifth Israeli attempt to assassinate Deif.

byline.original: By ISABEL KERSHNER and FARES AKRAM
byline.contributor: Isabel Kershner reported from Jerusalem, and Fares Akram from Gaza City. Jodi Rudoren contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: The chief, Muhammad Deif, lost one of his wives and a baby son in Tuesday’s bombing of a house in Gaza City.

headline.main: After Strike on Family, Fate of Hamas Commander Is Unknown
headline.print_headline: After Strike on Family, Fate of Hamas Commander Is Unknown
